Name: black piedra
Definition: A superficial mycosis that is a superficial fungal infection of the hair shaft caused by Piedraia hortae

Name: white piedra
Definition: A superficial mycosis that is a superficial fungal infection of the hair shaft caused by Trichosporon beigelii. Infected hairs develop soft greyish-white nodules along the shaft.

Name: obsolete malignant pleural effusion
Definition: A superficial mycosis that is a superficial fungal infection of the hair shaft caused by Trichosporon beigelii. Infected hairs develop soft greyish-white nodules along the shaft.

Name: tinea nigra
Definition: A superficial mycosis that is a superficial fungal infection of the skin characterized by brown to black macules which usually occur on the palmar aspects of hands and occasionally the plantar and other surfaces of the skin

Name: pityriasis versicolor
Definition: A superficial mycosis that is a chronic

Name: obsolete alcohol induced sleep disorder
Definition: A superficial mycosis that is a chronic
